se.jguru.nazgul.tools.plugin.checkstyle

Class IconTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.tools.plugin.checkstyle.IconTool

  • public class IconTool
extends Object
    A little tool to deal with info/warning/error icons in Checkstyle reports, with eventual text.
    Since:
    2.13
